entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @TeamTrump @parscale @realDonaldTrump Let's ventilated the ventilator issue before we jump into premature celebration. How many lives were saved by ventilators in US? What is the recuperation rate of patients who have been in ventilation? Are ventilators really a CURE in fighting COVID-19 deaths?
